column2:
'The second step is optional, and the environment may instead come from the Docker'
"uild context or ase image. In this case you're responsile for installing any Python"
'packages, y including them in your ase image, or specifying custom Docker steps.'
"You're also responsile for specifying the correct location for the Python executale. It is"
'also possile to use a custom Docker ase image.'
'Image caching and reuse'
'If you use the same environment definition for another jo, Azure Machine Learning'
'reuses the cached image from the Workspace ACR to save time.'
'To view the details of a cached image, check the Environments page in Azure Machine'
'Learning studio or use MLClient.environments to get and inspect the environment.'
